protein.specific_function: May serve as part of a signaling pathway coupling the Fc receptor to the activation of the respiratory burst. May also contribute to neutrophil migration and may regulate the degranulation process of neutrophils

go_class.description: non-membrane spanning protein tyrosine kinase activity
